text.autoconfig.nethermap.title: Better Nether Map Config
text.autoconfig.nethermap.option.useMapC: Use the height where the map was created in cave dimensions.
text.autoconfig.nethermap.option.fixedHe: Use a fixed height for cave dimensions.
text.autoconfig.nethermap.option.creatio: This list overrides the defaults, and can contain all dimensions.
text.autoconfig.nethermap.option.fixedEn: This list overrides the defaults, and can contain all dimensions.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.nethermap: Makes maps work better in the Nether and all other cave dimensions.
